description: This table extracts the related multiple response item Deviation Action Type (I OTP 6222), which is the Deviation Change Type of an order, in the context of an oncology treatment plan.

columns.name: OTP_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the patient order template record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: DEVIATION_ACTION_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column holds the change action type of the deviation (in context of oncology treatment plan deviations). For example, dose increase, dose decrease, change frequency, etc.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Copy Cycle


Copy Day


Add/Copy Order


Delete Order


Create Blank Plan

Dose Increase


Dose Decrease


Rate Increase


Rate Decrease


Frequency Change


Route Change


Increase Target AUC


Decrease Target AUC

Enter Order-Specific sCr Value

Decrease Frequency Per Day


AUC to Flat Dose


Multiple Dosage Sig Change
